issue.title: [Rust] Simplify macro def_numeric_from_vec
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10028](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10028). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we need to pass too many parameters to it, when they can be inferred.
